channel.description: The Venables Award aims to encourage statistical software development by providing formal recognition of these developments showcase the pool of statistical software developers in our local communities and raise awareness of the statistical tools developed by community members.

item.title: Tidy temporal data frames and pipelines
item.dc:creator: Earo Wang
item.description: An overview of tsibble's data structure and software design philosophy.

item.title: Making your own CV with R Markdown
item.dc:creator: Mitchell O'Hara-Wild
item.description: A brief introduction to the vitae package and tutorial for producing your own data driven CV.
